snippet: Organizations rooted in the comic book industry — including the Hero Initiative, the Comic Book Legal Defender and We Can Be Heroes — address personal, legal and global problems.
abstract: Organizations rooted in the comic book industry, including the Hero Initiative, address personal, legal and global problems for early people who built the business in the '30s and '40s who were typically paid a page rate and received no health benefits or royalties; if a character became a commercial success, it was the publisher who usually profited.
lead_paragraph: Organizations rooted in the comic book industry — including the Hero Initiative, the Comic Book Legal Defender and We Can Be Heroes — address personal, legal and global problems.

headline.seo: In Comic Book Industry, Needy Have Heroes of Their Own
headline.main: In Comics World, Needy Have Heroes of Their Own
headline.print_headline: In Comics World, Needy Have Heroes Of Their Own
